title: day for the purposes of the Water Services (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 39 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Water Services (Amendment) Act 2022
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Water Services (Amendment) Act 2022 

(Dissolution Day) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited water service (amendment) act 2022 (dissolution day) order 2022

title: day for the purposes of the Water Services (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 39 of
heading: 2. The 28th day of April 2023 is the day appointed to be the dissolution
text_raw:
2. The 28th day of April 2023 is the day appointed to be the dissolution 
day for the purposes of the Water Services (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 39 of 
2022). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

16 December, 2022. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 20th December, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [683] 3
text_norm: 2 28th day april 2023 day appointed dissolution day purpose water service (amendment) act 2022 (no 39 2022) given official seal 16 december 2022 darragh brien minister housing local government heritage notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 20th december 2022 683 3

title: day for the purposes of the Water Services (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 39 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order dissolves the Water Advisory Body established by the Water 
Services Act 2017 (Part 7) (Establishment Day) Order 2018 (S.I. No. 194 of 
2018) with effect from 28 April 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [683]
